content: knitted wrist-warmers in drops lima pattern li-187 yarn group b **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/xl fits wrist-circumference approx 15-16-17 cm length approx 16-17-19 cm **yarn** drops lima from garnstudio 50-50-100 g colour 9024 almond **needles** drops double pointed needles size 3 mm **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch on needle size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm
